item.title: Cushions, 20th August
item.description:

item.title: Priory Gardens: Entrance from Old Priory Avenue, 20th August
item.description:
Tue 19 Aug 2025: The green space by the entrance to Monks Walk (w3w driven.zealous.boom)looks unkempt and is often strewn with litter detracting from the approach to Priory Gardens. Please consider either (a) cutting grass when mowing inside Priory Gardens, or (b) designate the space as a Nature Friendly Verge and enable wild flowers to grow. Either way, please tidy and cut back footway edges. TIA

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Priory Avenue, Goddington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leafs accumulated for weeks, 20th August
item.description:
Leaves have been accumulating for weeks on this section of the street for over a week, and the area has not been cleaned for more than a month. I have reported similar issues many times, yet no regular cleaning is being carried out. This ongoing neglect not only creates an unpleasant environment but also poses a clear health and safety risk to residents. It is unacceptable that taxpayers are left to live surrounded by rubbish, and I feel genuinely ashamed to welcome visitors to my home under these conditions. I urge the council to take immediate action and ensure that your contractor fulfils their responsibility to maintain our street properly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Alscot Road, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
